```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

# Upload data
```{r}
ucsb_grad <- read.csv(here("data", "ucsb_grad_data.csv"))
```

# Create ggplot graph
```{r}
ggplot(data=ucsb_grad, aes(x=year_abbr, y=domestic_enrollment))+
  geom_col(aes(fill=ethnicity))
```
